CRITICAL_INSTRUCTIONS.NO_CUSTOM_CODING: Use ONLY Zapier native actions and integrations
CRITICAL_INSTRUCTIONS.USE_GITLAB_DUO_DATA: GitLab Duo and GitLab Copilot should use their own data, not user's data
CRITICAL_INSTRUCTIONS.USE_FREE_TOOLS_ONLY: Everything must be within FREE tier limits
CRITICAL_INSTRUCTIONS.PARALLEL_EXECUTION: All automations run simultaneously across all timezones
CRITICAL_INSTRUCTIONS.DATA_MINIMIZATION: Use least amount of data possible, prefer Zapier/GitLab data over user data

phase_1_multi_ai_research_pipeline.description: All 3 AI models running simultaneously for comprehensive coverage

phase_2_memory_storage_system.description: Store all results in multiple knowledge repositories

google_sheets.data_stored: Research results, trading signals, portfolio tracking

github.data_stored: Code snippets, technical specifications, bug tracking

phase_3_free_sandbox_coding_environment.description: Free coding environment using Zapier native tools

api_connections.use_case: Connect to external APIs (TradingView, exchanges, bonds APIs)

version_control.use_case: Store code, track changes, GitLab Duo integration

phase_4_trading_app_integration.description: Complete trading automation with FREE tools

storage.data: Alert details, AI analysis, timestamp, portfolio impact

notification.format: Structured message with analysis and recommendation

automated_trading_coding_system_architec.description: The exact architecture Zapier Copilot is building (from screenshot 4)
automated_trading_coding_system_architec.workflow: Webhook Trigger ‚Üí Claude Analysis ‚Üí Google Sheets + Slack Notifications

step_1_webhook_trigger.purpose: Receive trading signals, market data, bond prices, alerts

step_2_claude_analysis.purpose: Analyze incoming data and generate insights
step_2_claude_analysis.prompt_template: Analyze this trading signal: {{webhook_data}}. Provide: 1) Technical analysis 2) Risk level 3) Recommendation 4) Position sizing

TASK_1_BONDS_TRADING_24_7.description: Set up bonds trading across all timezones using FREE tools

actions.purpose: Fetch US Treasury bond rates (FREE API)
Parse bond data and calculate yields

actions.prompt: Analyze these bond rates: {{bond_data}}. Identify opportunities and risks. Consider current economic conditions.

actions.purpose: Track all bond data and analysis

TASK_2_MULTI_TIMEZONE_FOREX_CRYPTO.description: Trade forex and crypto 24 hours across all markets

trigger.source: TradingView alerts (FREE tier allows 1 alert per chart)

actions.prompt: Trading signal received: {{alert_data}}. Market: {{market_session}}. Analyze: 1) Trend strength 2) Support/resistance 3) Entry/exit points 4) Risk/reward ratio
Review Claude's analysis: {{claude_output}}. Validate strategy and suggest position sizing for account size: ${{account_balance}}

actions.purpose: Check current positions and available capital

actions.data: All signal data + AI analysis + decision

TASK_2_MULTI_TIMEZONE_FOREX_CRYPTO.cost: FREE (webhooks don't count toward task limit if properly filtered)

TASK_3_API_FINALIZATION.description: Finalize and test all API connections

openai_api.test_prompt: Respond with: OpenAI API is working correctly

anthropic_api.test_prompt: Respond with: Anthropic Claude API is working correctly

gemini_api.test_prompt: Respond with: Google Gemini API is working correctly

verification_zap.name: API Health Check Dashboard
actions: Record results in Google Sheets 'API Status Dashboard'
Send Slack notification if any API fails
Update SharePoint with daily API report

TASK_4_TRADING_RESULTS_DASHBOARD.description: Create automated dashboard to see all trading results

actions.purpose: Calculate: Total P&L, Win rate, Best trade, Worst trade, Number of trades

actions.prompt: Analyze today's trading performance: {{stats}}. Provide insights on: 1) What worked 2) What didn't 3) Tomorrow's strategy adjustments

actions.purpose: Update daily dashboard with latest stats

TASK_5_COMPLETE_MISSING_COMPONENTS.description: All components that were started but not finished

missing_items.zapier_role: Store completed prompts in SharePoint + GitHub

missing_items.action: Use existing ChatGPT connection in Zapier (already connected)
Use existing Anthropic (Claude) connection in Zapier (already connected)

GITLAB_DUO_INTEGRATION.purpose: Use GitLab Duo's data and AI assistance, not user's data

task_1.description: Review all code in Private-Claude repository
task_1.output: List of files with TODO, FIXME, or incomplete code

task_2.description: Complete master prompts using GitLab Duo AI
task_2.note: GitLab Duo generates content using its training data, not user data

task_3.description: Merge all Zapier automations with Agent 5.0

how_to_use_gitlab_duo.method_2: GitLab Duo Chat in web interface
how_to_use_gitlab_duo.data_source: GitLab's training data + repository context (not user's personal data)

AGENT_5_PARALLEL_EXECUTION_MERGE.description: Merge Zapier automations with Agent 5.0 master loop

co_primary_agents: GitLab Duo (handles code review and completion)

workflow.step_3: All 3 co-primary agents execute in parallel

zapier_to_agent5.action: Send results to Agent 5.0 Google Sheets

gitlab_duo_to_agent5.trigger: When code changes pushed to GitHub
gitlab_duo_to_agent5.action: GitLab Duo reviews and suggests improvements
gitlab_duo_to_agent5.sync: Bidirectional sync between GitHub and GitLab

COMMITTEE_100_ASSIGNMENTS.description: 100 specialized roles to complete master prompts

IMMEDIATE_ACTIONS_FOR_ZAPIER_COPILOT.use: Schedule by Zapier + Webhooks + Gemini + Google Sheets + Slack
Webhooks + Filter + Claude + ChatGPT + Google Sheets + Slack
Schedule + Webhooks (test all APIs) + Google Sheets + Slack
Schedule + Google Sheets lookup + Code (calculations) + Gemini + Slack

IMMEDIATE_ACTIONS_FOR_ZAPIER_COPILOT.action: Test all 5 APIs and verify results appear
IMMEDIATE_ACTIONS_FOR_ZAPIER_COPILOT.verification: Results must appear in Google Sheets

SUCCESS_CRITERIA.bonds_trading: Hourly updates in Google Sheets 'Bonds Trading 24/7 Log'
SUCCESS_CRITERIA.multi_timezone_trading: Alerts from all 4 trading sessions (Tokyo, London, NY, Sydney)
SUCCESS_CRITERIA.api_verification: All 5 APIs showing 'Success' in Google Sheets 'API Status Dashboard'
SUCCESS_CRITERIA.trading_results: Daily dashboard updates in Slack #trading-results channel
SUCCESS_CRITERIA.master_prompts: 8000 words √ó 8 divisions = 64,000 words completed by Committee 100
SUCCESS_CRITERIA.data_usage: Minimal - use Zapier/GitLab data, not user's personal data
